hero.Decsription: Train custom AI models tailored to your needs without coding. From one-click solutions for beginners to advanced options for experts.

features.title: Powerful AI Features
features.Decsription: Everything you need to create, fine-tune, and deploy custom AI models tailored to your specific needs.
features.feature1_description: Upload your data and start fine-tuning with a single click. No technical knowledge required.
features.feature2_description: Fine-tune hyperparameters, learning rates, and model architecture for technical users.
features.feature3_description: Test your fine-tuned models with a built-in chat interface to evaluate performance.
features.feature4_description: Generate custom images with fine-tuned diffusion models tailored to your style.
features.feature5_description: Convert text to natural-sounding speech using customizable voice models.
features.feature6_description: Deploy your fine-tuned models with API access for integration with your applications.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.Description: Get your custom AI models up and running in minutes with our simple process.
howItWorks.working1_description: Simply drag and drop your training data in various formats (text, images, CSV, JSON).
howItWorks.working2_description: Select a base model and configure parameters or use our recommended defaults.
howItWorks.working3_description: Click start and our platform handles the rest, notifying you when your model is ready.

whyChooseUs.Description: Whether you're a data scientist, developer, or enthusiast ‚Äî ModelChef lets you fine-tune powerful AI models with ease. No code. No stress. Just results.
whyChooseUs.reason1_description: Choose a model, upload your data, and click train. We handle the rest.
whyChooseUs.reason2_description: Only pay for the compute time you use ‚Äî no subscriptions needed.
whyChooseUs.reason3_description: Upload CSV, JSON, or HuggingFace datasets ‚Äî we automatically process and prepare your data for seamless training.
whyChooseUs.reason4_description: Fine-tune models with either our best default settings or if you are a techinal user you can choose your own best settings.
whyChooseUs.reason5_description: We take your privacy seriously. Your uploaded data will never be used for AI training, analysis, or any third-party access without your clear and explicit permission. You are always in full control, and nothing happens with your data unless

cta.title: Ready to Build Your Custom AI?
cta.Description: Start fine-tuning models to your specific needs in minutes, not months. Join thousands of companies already using our platform.
cta.no_credit: No credit card required. Free tier includes 10 hours of training.
